aboutMe_content1: Hi everyone, i am Viktor, a passionated Frontend-Developer based in Waldbroel.
aboutMe_content2: I create web applications with JavaScript & Angular, both independently and as part of a team.
aboutMe_content3: I am fascinated by the diversity of programming and as a junior front-end developer I am looking for opportunities to showcase my skills.
aboutMe_content4: You are cordially invited to explore my public portfolio.
